[ C ] the front part of your leg between your knee and your foot: She has a nasty bruise on her shin.
Dimedrol68/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
[ C or U ] a joint (= large piece) of meat from the lower leg of a cow: a shin of beef
